price: 46. Makki koros baaxô bagul magexinnaa finqite marih abuura yableenimkeh? Wohul ken sorkocobbaxitte kas elle geytamkeh, hinnay wohul aytiitay kassis edde yaabbeeni gcyaanamkeh, tokkel diggah intiita mawaytinta, kinnih immay cagalah alilwat tan sorkocobaxitte cakki able waytam.
arabic: أَفَلَمۡ يَسِيرُواْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَتَكُونَ لَهُمۡ قُلُوبٞ يَعۡقِلُونَ بِهَآ أَوۡ ءَاذَانٞ يَسۡمَعُونَ بِهَاۖ فَإِنَّهَا لَا تَعۡمَى ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَلَٰكِن تَعۡمَى ٱلۡقُلُوبُ ٱلَّتِي فِي ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afalam yasīrū fī al-arḍi fatakūna lahum qulūbun yaʿqilūna bihā aw ādhānun yasmaʿūna bihā fa-innahā lā taʿmā al-abṣāru walākin taʿmā al-qulūbu allatī fī al-ṣudūri
